pr_title: EQL: Wrap a verification_exception in an index_not_found_exception in case there is no valid index available

timeline.message:
Wrap a verification_exception in case there is no valid index available
in an index_not_found_exception providing also the original index pattern
that may be lost in the chain of filters involving the Security one.

timeline.bodyText: Would be good to add a comment on why this is needed.
timeline.author: costin

timeline.bodyText: A comment is useful to indicate why the Verification exception is wrapped inside an infe
timeline.author: costin
